listings.title: Luxury Villa in Northrise
listings.description: Stunning 6-bedroom villa with swimming pool, landscaped gardens, and panoramic views. Features include modern kitchen, marble floors, and 3-car garage.

listings.title: Student Accommodation Near CBU
listings.description: Affordable 1-bedroom flat perfect for students. Furnished with bed, study desk, and kitchenette. Safe and secure environment.

listings.title: Family Home with Garden
listings.description: Cozy 3-bedroom house with large garden, perfect for families with children. Includes servant quarters and secure parking.

listings.title: Modern Townhouse Rental
listings.description: Brand new 2-bedroom townhouse with modern amenities, air conditioning, and 24/7 security. Gated community with playground.

listings.title: Industrial Warehouse Space
listings.description: Large warehouse facility suitable for manufacturing or storage. Includes office space, loading bay, and 24-hour security.
